►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week the Samsung Galaxy Ring became a huge sales success, with Samsung increasing production 2.5x to 1 million units, multiple credible reports claim the foldable iPhone Flip is coming in 2026 and Open source AI got a big shot in the arm from the Meta Llama 3.1 and Mistral Large 2.

Episode 207
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-samsungs-surprise-success
